description: 0A2B: 1x Prunus sp. Reshape Crown by no more than 1m to balance canopy.0A2C: 6x Conifers. Trim footpath boundary side to reduce encroachment to footpath.0A2D: 1x Conifer. Trim top and sides to shape and tidy.0A2E: 1x Holly & 2x Conifers. Trim footpath boundary side to reduce encroachment to footpath.0A2F: 1x Silver Birch. Crown clean and lift canopy to 2m above ground level.0A2G: 1x Unidentified Broadleaf. Crown clean & Reshape crown by no more than 1m to balance canopy.0A2H: 1x Silver Birch. Lift Crown to 2m above ground level, crown clean and reshape crown by no more than 1m to balance.0A2J: 1x Silver Birch. Lift Crown to 2m above ground level, crown clean and reshape crown by no more than 1m to balance.0A2K: 1x Silver Birch. Lift Crown to 2m above ground level, crown clean and reshape crown by no more than 1m to balance.Individual tree specifications and survey attached to plan.
